# foregroundStyle(by:)

**Instance Method**

Represents data using a foreground style.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated func foregroundStyle(by value: PlottableProjection<Self.DataElement, some Plottable>) -> some VectorizedChartContent<Self.DataElement>

```

## Parameters

- **value**: The data value to encode using foreground style.

## Encoding data into mark characteristics

- **lineStyle(by:)**: Represents data using line styles.
- **symbol(by:)**: Represents data using different kinds of symbols.
- **symbolSize(by:)**: Represents data using symbol sizes.

items.description: Represents data using different kinds of symbols.
